body:
Hi, how are you guys today?

I just made a render on my 3D program.

Id like to hear your opinion, also, If I should offer this as a feauture on my shop and if I should ask for money when someone asks me for this...




Thanks! :D

title: What do you think about this?

replies.body: Nice :)

replies.body: It seems you are German? I'm only guessing from the flag. Anyways, really nice! If we decide to put an Avicus UHC series on YouTube, we could use your help to make some of those, especially when we do teams instead of FFA.

replies.body:
No. Plain no. What is it? Cinema 4D in 1 frame only. Anyone who knows how to use Cinema 4D could do this under 15 minutes xd.
No offence but it's plainly way too simple to make to even ask any type of currency, hard money or no.

Its a nice render, but it's not worth money.

replies.body:
A better way of importing worlds into Cinema4D is through a program called "MineWays."

Search it up and watch a few tutorials, once you understand it it's much easier to use.

replies.body:
Lol, didnt finish the post... well the point is (btw I used Mineways) is that as it asked me for the scala I "quick-clicked" and the result was scala 1. The recomended is scala 8...

That also affects the flag, as well I know there is that option called wind. The thing is that as being so small, the WindFX was moving constantly the flag to other directions, not making it like I wanted.

Also it was quick done, was for myself and Just a test :P

Anyway, on the big renders I put all my effort into!
replies.body_tagged:
Lol, didnt finish the post... well the point is (btw I used Mineways) is that as it asked me for the scala I "quick-clicked" and the result was scala 1. The recomended is scala 8...

That also affects the flag, as well I know there is that option called wind. The thing is that as being so small, the WindFX was moving constantly the flag to other directions, not making it like I wanted.

Also it was quick done, was for myself and Just a test :P

Anyway, on the big renders I put all my effort into!
